thread.title: New York penthouse where even the car parking space has amazing city views
thread.title_full: New York penthouse where even the car parking space has amazing city views

author: Gina Faridniya
title: New York penthouse where even the car parking space has amazing city views
text:
EVEN the car parking space has amazing city views in this New York penthouse.
listed for $27.9 million this duplex penthouse on Manhattan’s Eleventh Avenue has what you would expect, views of the Hudson River, two covered terraces, three bedrooms, and three full and one half bathrooms, according to the listing.
Floor-to-ceiling windows throughout the home offer views of the Hudson River. Picture: The Corcoran Group. Source: Supplied
Glass doors open to a staircase that leads to the master suite on the lower level. But perhaps the biggest perk is parking: an elevator called the “sky garage” can take a car from the street directly to the apartment.
The residence includes two covered terraces: one is off the living room; the other is connected to the study and the garage. Picture: The Corcoran Group. Source: Supplied
Known as the sky garage, the car elevator can take a car from the street to a private garage attached to the residence. Picture: The Corcoran Group. Source: Supplied
The apartment is listed through Carrie Chiang of The Corcoran Group.
For more luxury property around the world visit Mansion Global. Four Horsemen 1:38:31 Play video
We are in a new age of decadence, of celebrity chefs, spiralling house prices and self-obsession. And these are the first stages of the decline of empire.
Oovvuu 30 Apr 2015 TV/Business TV/Money TV/Society and Culture TV/Documentary
